item.title: 第一季度利润下降后，梅赛德斯-奔驰誓言捍卫定价水平
item.description: 豪华汽车制造商梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）周二公布的第一季度利润和销量均低于预期，并表示将保持和捍卫第一季度的高定价水平。【原文：Luxury carmaker Mercedes-Benz on Tuesday reported lower first-quarter profits and sales that were in line with expectations, adding it would hold and defend high pricing levels seen in the first quarter.】

item.title: 德国沃诺维亚公司在业绩下滑中勉强恢复盈利
item.description: 德国最大的房地产集团 Vonovia 周二发布报告称，尽管德国房地产在数十年来最严重的危机中持续低迷，但该集团第一季度已恢复盈利。【原文：Vonovia , Germany's largest real estate group, on Tuesday reported that it returned to profit in the first quarter, even as the nation's property continues to writhe amid its worst crisis in decades.】

item.title: 特斯拉在中国的自动驾驶竞标面临竞争对手的竞相追赶
item.description: 如果特斯拉能成功地将其 "全自动驾驶 "系统引入中国这个全球最大的汽车市场，那么这家美国电动汽车先驱企业将在全球自动驾驶汽车竞赛中驶入快车道。【原文：If Tesla succeeds in bringing its "Full Self-Driving" system to China, the world's largest car market, the U.S. electric-car pioneer will be shifting into the fast lane of the global race toward autonomous vehicles.】

item.title: 聚焦：快时尚巨头 Shein 也想卖护肤品、牙膏和玩具
item.description: 在线快速时尚零售商Shein正在追求牙膏集团高露洁-棕榄公司和玩具制造商孩之宝公司等品牌，试图在其平台上销售更多家喻户晓的品牌。【原文：Online fast-fashion retailer Shein is courting brands like toothpaste conglomerate Colgate-Palmolive and toymaker Hasbro as it tries to sell more household names on its platform.】

item.title: 市场放缓，法国凯捷第一季度销售额下降
item.description: 法国 IT 咨询集团凯捷（Capgemini）周二报告称，第一季度收入低于去年同期，原因是市场预期放缓。【原文：French IT consulting group Capgemini reported lower first-quarter revenue on Tuesday, compared with the same period last year, citing an expected slowdown in the market.】

item.title: 加密世界TON 通过与 Telegram 合作起飞
item.description: 最近几个月，一种名为 TON 的硬币价值飙升，投资者押注它与信使服务 Telegram 的整合能将加密货币带给该应用的约 9 亿用户。【原文：A coin called TON has leapt in value in recent months, with investors betting its integration with messenger service Telegram could bring the cryptocurrency to the app's estimated 900 million users.】

item.title: 汉莎航空预测罢工后上半年将恢复盈利
item.description: 德国国旗航空公司汉莎航空周二表示，希望在今年下半年挽回与罢工有关的损失，并指出夏季旺季的预订量比上年增长了 16%。【原文：Lufthansa hopes to claw back its strike-related losses in the second half of the year, the German flag carrier said on Tuesday, pointing to a strong summer season with bookings up 16% on the previous year.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，特斯拉马斯克在更多裁员中裁减高级管理人员
item.description: 据 The Information 周二援引马斯克发给高级管理人员的一封电子邮件报道，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正在精简公司的高级管理团队，并裁员数百人。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk is thinning the company's senior management team and laying off hundreds more employees, The Information reported on Tuesday, citing an email sent by Musk to senior executives.】

item.title: 欧洲零售业务稳健，桑坦德银行第一季度净利润增长 11
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Santander）周二表示，第一季度净利润同比增长 11%，原因是其稳健的欧洲零售业务受益于利率上升和多元化业务战略，从而实现了收入的稳步增长。【原文：Santander on Tuesday said its first-quarter net profit rose 11% year-on-year as its solid retail business in Europe benefited from higher interest rates and a diversified business strategy that allowed a steady revenues growth.】

item.title: 欧洲 日元波动，欧元区通胀岌岌可危
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天：【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee:】

item.title: 微软首席执行官称，微软将在印尼投资 17 亿美元用于云计算和人工智能领域
item.description: 到访的微软首席执行官萨蒂亚-纳德拉（Satya Nadella）周二在一次研讨会上表示，微软将在印尼投资17亿美元，通过建设数据中心等方式，为东南亚国家提供云计算和人工智能服务。【原文：Microsoft will invest $1.7 billion in Indonesia to empower the Southeast Asian country with cloud and artificial intelligence, including by building data centres, visiting chief executive Satya Nadella said in a seminar on Tuesday.】

item.title: 汇丰银行第一季度利润下降 1.8%，但超出预期
item.description: 汇丰控股周二公布第一季度利润下降 1.8%，原因是该公司正努力应对亚洲扩张带来的成本上升和通胀压力。【原文：HSBC Holdings reported a 1.8% drop in first-quarter profit on Tuesday as it struggles to cope with rising costs from expansion in Asia and amid inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 汇丰银行首席执行官诺埃尔-奎因将退休
item.description: 汇丰控股（HSBC Holdings）周二表示，其首席执行官诺埃尔-奎恩（Noel Quinn）已决定退休。【原文：HSBC Holdings , on Tuesday said its chief executive, Noel Quinn, has decided to retire.】

item.title: 中国开发商奇幻城娱乐提出新的重组条款，股价上涨
item.description: 陷入困境的中国房地产开发商奇幻城娱乐周一表示，已与债券持有人特别小组达成新协议，以新票据和股票对其 40 亿美元债券进行重组。【原文：Embattled Chinese property developer Fantasia said on Monday it has entered into a new agreement with its ad hoc group of bondholders to restructure its $4 billion dollar bonds with new notes and equities.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，高盛正在洽谈向巴克莱银行出售通用汽车信用卡合作项目
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）正在商谈将其通用汽车信用卡项目转让给巴克莱银行（Barclays）。【原文：Goldman Sachs is in talks to transfer its General Motors credit-card program to Barclays , the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲首只现货比特币和以太坊 ETF 在香港首次亮相即告上涨
item.description: 六只现货比特币和以太坊交易所交易基金（ETF）周二在香港首次亮相就取得了上涨，其中三只比特币ETF早盘攀升超过3%，反映出亚洲投资者对加密货币的热情。【原文：Six spot bitcoin and ether exchange traded funds (ETFs) gained in their Hong Kong debut on Tuesday, with the three bitcoin ETFs climbing more than 3% in early trade, reflecting Asian investor enthusiasm for cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 消息人士称激进投资者埃利奥特收购日本住友银行股份
item.description: 一位熟悉情况的人士周二表示，美国对冲基金埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management Corp）已购入住友商事（Sumitomo Corp）价值数百亿日元的股份。【原文：U.S. hedge fund Elliott Management Corp has bought a stake in Sumitomo Corp worth several tens of billions of yen, a person familiar with the situation said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 马来西亚肯德基以经济形势严峻为由暂时关闭分店
item.description: 马来西亚肯德基以经济形势严峻为由暂时关闭了在该国的分店，此前当地媒体报道称，关闭分店的原因是该快餐连锁店被认为与以色列有联系而遭到抵制。【原文：KFC Malaysia has temporarily closed outlets in the country, citing challenging economic conditions, after local media reported that the closings were because of boycotts over the fast food chain's perceived links to Israel.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称亚太地区经济将 "软着陆
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）周二表示，尽管未来两年的经济扩张预计将放缓，但快速的通货紧缩和有韧性的增长将帮助亚太地区实现 "软着陆"。【原文：Rapid disinflation and resilient growth will help Asia Pacific achieve a "soft landing" even though economic expansion is expected to slow over the next two years, the International Monetary Fund (IMF) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国万科首只上市商业地产信托基金首日早盘下跌
item.description: 周二，中国万科首款公开发售的商业地产投资产品在早盘交易中跌幅高达 3%，反映出在房地产市场长期低迷的情况下，市场对这家中国第二大开发商持谨慎态度。【原文：China Vanke's first public commercial real estate investment products fell as much as 3% in early trade on their debut on Tuesday, reflecting caution towards China's second-largest developer amid a prolonged property market downturn.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，日元在本周震荡开局后摇摆不定
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市走高，投资者在等待一系列经济数据、企业盈利和美国联邦储备委员会的政策会议，而日元在疑似干预将其从 34 年低点拯救出来一天后略微走软。【原文：Asian stocks inched higher on Tuesday as investors awaited a slew of economic data, corporate earnings and the U.S. Federal Reserve's policy meeting, while the yen was slightly weaker a day after suspected intervention rescued it from 34-year lows.】

item.title: 财新PMI显示，中国工厂活动以14个月来最快速度扩张
item.description: 周二的一项民间调查显示，受新出口订单稳健回升的推动，中国制造业活动在4月份以14个月来最快的速度扩张，这对于仍在努力实现强劲复苏的经济来说是一个令人鼓舞的迹象。【原文：China's manufacturing activity expanded at the fastest pace in 14 months in April, driven by a solid uptick in new export orders, a private survey showed on Tuesday, an encouraging sign for an economy still struggling to mount a robust recovery.】

item.title: 中国 4 月份工厂活动增速放缓
item.description: 周二进行的一项官方工厂调查显示，中国 4 月份制造业活动扩张速度放缓，表明这一庞大的行业在第二季度初失去了一些发展势头。【原文：China's manufacturing activity expanded at a slower pace in April, an official factory survey showed on Tuesday, suggesting some loss of momentum for the sprawling sector at the start of the second quarter.】

item.title: 日元在疑似干预后坚持大幅上涨，美联储成为焦点
item.description: 周二，日元兑美元汇率保持稳定，前一天大幅上涨，交易商称这是日本当局疑似干预引发的走势。【原文：The yen held its line against the dollar on Tuesday after making sharp gains the previous day in moves that traders said were sparked by suspected intervention by Japanese authorities.】

item.title: 4 月份中国非制造业活动增速放缓
item.description: 周二的一项官方调查显示，中国 4 月份非制造业活动增速放缓，这可能是由于南方地区的恶劣天气对建筑和服务业造成了干扰。【原文：China's non-manufacturing activity expanded at a slower pace in April, an official survey showed on Tuesday, likely due to disruption caused to construction and services businesses by adverse weather in the southern region.】

item.title: 电脑配件制造商罗技第四季度销售额增长，两年多来首次实现季度增长
item.description: 罗技国际公司（Logitech International）周二表示，该电脑外设制造商在第四季度的销售额有所增长，结束了在经历了大流行病带动的繁荣之后长达两年半的销售下滑。【原文：Logitech International increased its sales during its fourth quarter, the computer peripherals maker said on Tuesday, snapping two-and-a-half years of sales downturns after a pandemic-driven boom.】

item.title: 投资者关注以色列-加沙停战谈判和美国美联储政策审查，原油下跌
item.description: 周二早盘，在开罗举行的以色列-哈马斯停火谈判帮助平息了市场对中东冲突扩大的担忧之后，石油价格有所回落。【原文：Oil edged down in early trade on Tuesday after Israel-Hamas ceasefire talks in Cairo helped quell market fears of an expanded conflict in the Middle East, while worries about the outlook for U.S. interest rates weighed on the market.】

item.title: 日本 3 月工厂产出环比增长 3.8
item.description: 日本政府周二公布的数据显示，日本 3 月份工厂产出环比增长 3.8%，而市场预测中值为增长 3.5%。【原文：Japan's factory output rose 3.8% in March from the previous month, versus the median market forecast for a 3.5% rise, government data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 三星称人工智能将推动下半年技术需求增长
item.description: 三星电子周二表示，预计下半年人工智能需求将保持强劲，从而推动存储芯片和科技设备的销售，该公司第一季度营业利润增长了 10 倍多。【原文：Samsung Electronics said on Tuesday it expected demand for artificial intelligence to hold strong in the second half, driving sales of memory chips and tech devices, as it reported a more than 10-fold rise in first-quarter operating profit.】

item.title: 日本 3 月失业率持平于 2.6
item.description: 日本政府周二公布的数据显示，日本 3 月份的失业率为 2.6%，与 2 月份持平。【原文：Japan's jobless rate in March was unchanged at 2.6% compared to February, government data showed on Tuesday.】
